review: It's fine for what it does.  I find the remote to be a little difficult to get used to, but I'm sure I will.  For some reason, I thought the Fire TV would connect me to the internet and in effect make my TV a monitor for my computer via wi-fi connection.  I'm a little disappointed with the black-out restrictions on MLB TV, even for spring training games when they specifically state that black out restrictions do not apply for spring training games, but I realize that has nothing to do with the Fire TV.  Your help desk/customer service people have been very patient and excellent, going above and beyond.  Bravo for that!
author: Michael Blaz
